sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( select COPT_ORG_CD, row_numBER() OVER(ORDER BY COPT_ORG_CD ASC) NN from ( SELECT DISTINCT COPT_ORG_CD FROM TBFAAAEA001M ) where length(COPT_ORG_CD) = 7 ) WHERE NN BETWEEN #num# and #num2#
SELECT F_ORG_INFO(COPT_OFI_CD, '1') || '_' || F_ORG_INFO(BAI_ORG_CD, '1') || '_' || SYS_NM AS FILE_NM ,SYS_NM ,COPT_ORG_CD FROM TBFAAAEA001M WHERE COPT_ORG_CD = #COPT_ORG_CD#;

SELECT COPT_ORG_CD AS COPT_ORG_CD, SYS_NM SYS_NM, COPT_ORG_NM COPT_ORG_NM, F_ORG_INFO(COPT_OFI_CD, '1') COPT_OFI_CD, SYS_DES SYS_DES, SUBSTR(SYS_BGN_DT,1,4) AS SYS_BGN_DT, URL_AD URL_AD, OP_DPT_NM OP_DPT_NM, OP_CHGR_NM OP_CHGR_NM, OP_CHGR_CNIF_NM OP_CHGR_CNIF_NM, BAI_ORG_CD BAI_ORG_CD FROM TBFAAAEA001M WHERE COPT_ORG_CD = #COPT_ORG_CD# AND SYS_NM = #SYS_NM#

SELECT COPT_ORG_CD AS COPT_ORG_CD, SYS_NM SYS_NM, TO_CHAR(SRNO) SRNO, CON_ORG_NM CON_ORG_NM, CON_INF_SYS_NM CON_INF_SYS_NM, INN_EXTL_CON_DVSN_CD INN_EXTL_CON_DVSN_CD, SNDRCV_DVSN_NM SNDRCV_DVSN_NM, MAIN_CON_TXT MAIN_CON_TXT, CON_MEAN_NM CON_MEAN_NM, CON_DVSN_NM CON_DVSN_NM FROM TBFAAAEA030M WHERE COPT_ORG_CD = #COPT_ORG_CD# AND SYS_NM = #SYS_NM#
SELECT COPT_ORG_CD AS COPT_ORG_CD, SYS_NM SYS_NM, NVL(UNT_SYS_NM, SYS_NM) AS UNT_SYS_NM, UNT_SYS_DES UNT_SYS_DES FROM TBFAAAEA002M WHERE COPT_ORG_CD = #COPT_ORG_CD# AND SYS_NM = #SYS_NM#

SELECT COPT_ORG_CD AS COPT_ORG_CD, SYS_NM SYS_NM, NVL(UNT_SYS_NM, SYS_NM) AS UNT_SYS_NM, TO_CHAR(REL_LW_SRNO) REL_LW_SRNO, REL_LW_TXT REL_LW_TXT FROM TBFAAAEA005M A WHERE COPT_ORG_CD = #COPT_ORG_CD# AND SYS_NM = #SYS_NM#
SELECT COPT_ORG_CD AS COPT_ORG_CD, SYS_NM SYS_NM, NVL(UNT_SYS_NM, SYS_NM) AS UNT_SYS_NM, TBL_ID TBL_ID, TBL_NM , TBL_DES FROM TBFAAAEA003M WHERE COPT_ORG_CD = #COPT_ORG_CD# AND SYS_NM = #SYS_NM#
SELECT COPT_ORG_CD AS COPT_ORG_CD, SYS_NM SYS_NM, NVL(UNT_SYS_NM, SYS_NM) AS UNT_SYS_NM, TBL_ID , COL_ID , COL_NM , COL_DES FROM TBFAAAEA004M WHERE COPT_ORG_CD = #COPT_ORG_CD# AND SYS_NM = #SYS_NM#
